attributes.additional_details: The government is who we vote for to be our voice. You’re our only hope right now.
attributes.background: Stop the oil companies from raising prices constantly. Wages have not increased to compare with living costs! Petrol is extortionate right now, we work to pay for petrol & rent. We have no voice & no choice but to pay!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for retailers.  

We could accept a petition calling for the Government to reduce fuel duty it collects, if that's something you'd like to see happen.
